meanings.definition: The presence of excessive voltage in an electrical circuit.
meanings.sent1: The overvoltages in the circuit caused the light bulbs to flicker.
meanings.sent2: Electricians use special equipment to detect overvoltages in circuits.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel must have caused the overvoltages by chewing on the wires.
meanings.sent4: The overvoltages surged through the circuit like a powerful wave.
meanings.sent5: The overvoltages were like a storm brewing in the calm circuit.

meanings.definition: To subject to an excessive voltage.
meanings.sent1: Be careful not to overvoltages the sensitive equipment during testing.
meanings.sent2: The technician accidentally overvoltages the device, causing it to malfunction.
meanings.sent3: The playful robot seemed to enjoy being overvoltages by the scientist.
meanings.sent4: The power surge overvoltages the entire system, leading to a shutdown.
meanings.sent5: The experiment went wrong when the scientist decided to overvoltages the machine.
